product_name: Maglite Mini Maglite Pro 2 AA LED Flashlight
long_description: The Maglite Mini Maglite Pro(TM) 2 AA LED flashlight has the same great look and feel as the original Mini Maglite but with a brighter, more efficient beam. High-quality LED outputs 226 lumens and throws a beam up to 140m to light up your nighttime adventures. Just like with the original Mini Maglite, a simple twist of the head turns the light on and focuses the beam from spot to flood. Rugged anodized aluminum construction with knurled design is corrosion and water resistant. 2 AA batteries (included) provide up to 2 hrs. 30 min. of use.
short_description: The Maglite Mini Maglite Pro(TM) 2 AA LED flashlight has the same great look and feel as the original Mini Maglite but with a brighter, more efficient beam.
